# CustomerReview.Attributes

**Object**

The attributes of the customer’s review including its content.

## Declaration

```swift
object CustomerReview.Attributes
```

## Types

- **TerritoryCode**: The App Store territory codes.

## Objects

- **CustomerReview.Relationships**: The relationships you include in the request and those on which you can operate.
